problem_text_cn: 如图,在▱ABCD中,E是BC边上的点,AE交BD于点F,BE:BC=2:3,则BF:DF的值是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD, E is the point on BC, AE intersects BD at point F, BE:BC=N_0:N_1, then the value of BF:DF is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AD=BC,AD∥BC,∵BE:BC=2:5,∴BE:AD=2:5,△ADF∽△EBF,∴\frac{BF}{DF}=\frac{BE}{AD}=\frac{2}{3}．故选:A．
raw_comment: 此题考查了平行四边形的性质,相似三角形的判定与性质．此题难度不大,解题的关键是熟练掌握相似三角形的判定和性质．
